meanings.definition: Relating to the branch of dentistry that deals with the prevention and correction of irregular teeth.
meanings.sent1: The orthodontic treatment helped fix my crooked teeth.
meanings.sent2: She visited the orthodontic clinic to get her braces adjusted.
meanings.sent3: The orthodontic procedure made me feel like a tooth superhero!
meanings.sent4: Her smile transformed into a straight line after the orthodontic care.
meanings.sent5: The orthodontic work made her grin sparkle like never before.

meanings.definition: A type of dental treatment that involves the use of braces or other devices to straighten teeth.
meanings.sent1: I have an orthodontic appointment next week to check my braces.
meanings.sent2: The orthodontic process can take some time to show results.
meanings.sent3: His orthodontic gear made him look like a futuristic robot.
meanings.sent4: The orthodontic journey was like a rollercoaster ride for her teeth.
meanings.sent5: The orthodontic tools worked their magic on his smile.
